features: 🎅【Dust pans with brush】Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan ,Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth.This amazing dustpan was designed for your convenience so you can have perfect results with no hassle!

🎅【Easy Stand-up Storage】After using broom and dustpa, you can make it stand in a corner and act as a trash can temporarily.! Compact storage keep your home or work space clean and tidy. Works perfectly for multi-surface, Suitable for indoor use.
🎅【Built in Comb Teeth】The broom and dustpan set for home builts in comb teeth for easy to scrape off the pet/human hair and rubbish of the broom bristles into dustpan, no need to drag by hand.

🎅【Premium Broom and Dustpan Set】The broom and dust pan are crafted with special care and the best quality materials so you can enjoy unique durability. The steel handle is ultra-strong heavy duty so it can stay in top condition for years to come no matter what and the dustpan is made with sturdy ABS plastic for flawless results!

🎅【Dense Broom bristles】 Dense bristles design, high quality broom bristle construction, More dense and durable. Eco-friendly fiber made from recycled PET bottles. Let's insists on working hard to protect the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice fits anywhere ,when not being used ,awsome for fast cleaning small messes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dustpan But The Broom Is Flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this because I needed something that is compact/folds down since I like to minimize things. So this fits nicely in the small space between my fridge and wall (I use magnetic hooks to hang them on the side of the fridge) so it is out of sight. The dustpan is great, and honestly I purchased this mainly for the dustpan. The broom is not practical as it swivels to the sides which is great when you want to store the broom but not effective when you're sweeping because it keeps swiveling which makes it difficult to sweep.Deducted one star for the impractical/lack of effectiveness for the broom which is generous considering I purchased this mainly for the dustpan. But for those who need both broom and dustpan, I would not recommend since the broom is not very functional.Durability wise, it's pretty good for the cost. Lightweight and more durable than most for the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broom is trash
reviews.reviewText: Broom is junk the swivel wont hold the broom in place to use it plus its very short

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the dustpan. It does what it's made for. But the broom bristles are too flimsy. It takes several times sweeping to get the dirt into the dustpan . So I have been using my regular broom to get the dirt in the dustpan, which defeats the purpose of why I bought this. It's awkward using my broom .I think if the bristles were stiffer I would give it a 5 star review

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Easy to store. It’s nice quality and doesn’t bend and still feels substantial in the hand. Great value. Picture shows the one I bought 5 months ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I’m short and this broom is too short for me. The dustpans is fine but the handle doesn’t stay together. The broom is cheaply made but it does the job well enough for my needs- I am using it on my office which doesn’t get much traffic. If you are wanting a broom you will use often, I would not recommend this product. If you are under 5 feet tall maybe this broom will work for you. After using this I decided to return it. I’m sick of dealing with it falling apart. I’ll probably go to a local store and buy one so I can tell the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but…
reviews.reviewText: It’s easy to put together and works well BUT it both of the handles are rather short. I’m 5’11” and these are nearly two feet shorter. One more foot of handle would do wonders for the broom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product to save your back
reviews.reviewText: We are a repeat customer with this tall handles broom and dustpan. Works great in the mud room for a quick touch up or to gather the stuffing from our pups latest deconstructed toy. It even works on the carpet in a pinch with its stiff broom. I bought serial so I could take a couple to our home in Baja.
Consider yourself lucky if you receive the same product as shown
